voidheart.void_amalgam.lore2: I must become one with your Heart
voidheart.void_heart.lore: Please... Let me return to the Void.
voidheart.void_pearl.lore: Eat me to go to your Void Pocket
voidheart.no_portal_at_pos: The target pos is not a portal
voidheart.portal_shape_differ: The target portal is not of the same shape
voidheart.portal_form_error: Cannot form the portal. Invalid shape.
voidheart.must_be_inside_outside: Portals cannot link two places outside or two inside the pocket
voidheart.link_started_pocket: Started Link. Now hit a portal outside your Pocket
voidheart.link_started_outside: Started Link. Now hit a portal in your Pocket
